name: De'Tris
description:
'De'Tris' is a 2D Tetris-like game.
Features [will] include:

  • 4 new blocks for a new 'micro' level!
  • 2 new levels to play (micro [3 blocks wide board] and multiplayer!
  • Beautiful pixel art blocks and backgrounds!
  • And [maybe] more things to come...

Demo:

A free demo of the original Tetris is available for download and play!

  • The demo includes Tetris' original level and color palette, Tetris' original level with new color palette and Tetris' original level with new sprites and backgrounds.
